document_data.mainbody:
Mreskers Hide was a harbor on the isle of Thelve in Sea of Swords, just off the shores of Candlekeep.
Mreskers Hide was located in the bay shaped like a half-moon on Thelves southern half of the eastern shores. The harbor was facing the waters of the Racewind Passage and Skoonds Run. Mreskers Hide was likely left over from a gnomish tribe that once inhabited the island but was long-exterminated by the Twilight Three by the 14 century DR.
